purpleculture_pinyin:
huì
to draw; to paint
рисовать; рисовать
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 绘)
Pictophonetic: 會 indicates the sound; 糹 (silk) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
繪畫 [ huì huà ]: drawing; painting
繪製 [ huì zhì ]: to draw; to draft
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 糹 [ sī ] silk; thread
    • 會 [ huì ] to assemble, to meet; meeting; association, group
heisig_chinese_memo: Spidey holds a superhero meeting where he proposes that all the heros start wearing warpaint on their faces because the villains aren't scared of them anymore.
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: People get pictures of Spidey in his short meetings with the public but he moves too quickly for them to paint him.
humanum_full_description_en:
From "糸", "会" sound, the original meaning is colorful embroidery. "Shu Wen": "Will five pick embroidery. "Yu Shu" said: Shanlong Hua Chong painted. "The Analects of Confucius" said: painting after the matter. From Shito, Huisheng." Southern Liang Liu Xie "Wen Xin Diao Long‧ Zong "Skill": "If you look at it, you will be painted, and if you listen, you will be silk spring."

" Draw " can mean a picture. Tang Yinfan's "Heyue Heroes Collection‧ Wang Wei": "The poems are elegant and elegant, and the meaning is new and comfortable. They are pearls in the spring and painted on the wall."

" Painting " also means painting. "The Family Instructions of the Yan Family: Variety Art" of the Northern Qi Yanzhi: "The work of painting and drawing is also wonderful; since ancient times, celebrities are more or less capable."

" E " also means description. Qing Liang Tingzhan's "Qu Hua" 3: ""Peach Blossom Fan" has a succinct brushwork, depicting characters from the Southern Dynasties, and the words are painted with shadows and sounds.
humanum_short_description_en: From "糸", "会" sound, the original meaning is colorful embroidery.
humanum_full_description:
從「糸」，「會」聲，本義為五彩的刺繡。《說文》：「會五采繡也。《虞書》曰：山龍華蟲作繪。《論語》曰：繪事後素。从糸，會聲。」南朝梁劉勰《文心雕龍‧總術》：「視之則錦繪，聽之則絲簧。」

　　「繪」可表示圖畫。唐殷璠《河岳英靈集‧王維》：「詞秀調雅，意新理愜，在泉為珠，著壁成繪。」

　　「繪」也表示作畫。北齊顏之推《顏氏家訓‧雜藝》：「畫繪之工，亦為妙矣；自古名士，多或能之。」

　　「繪」還表示描寫。清梁廷枬《曲话》三：「《桃花扇》笔意疏爽，写南朝人物，字字绘影绘声。」
humanum_short_description: 從「糸」，「會」聲，本義為五彩的刺繡。

Chinese: Spidey holds a superhero meeting where he proposes that all the heros start wearing warpaint on their faces because the villains aren't scared of them anymore.
Meaning: paint
Hanzi: 绘
Story: People get pictures of Spidey in his short meetings with the public but he moves too quickly for them to paint him.
Kind: traditional

從「 糸 」，「 會 」聲，本義為五彩的刺繡。《說文》：「會五采繡也。《虞書》曰：山龍華蟲作繪。《論語》曰：繪事後素。从糸，會聲。」南朝梁劉勰《文心雕龍‧總術》：「視之則錦繪，聽之則絲簧。」 「 繪 」可表示圖畫。唐殷璠《河岳英靈集‧王維》：「詞秀調雅，意新理愜，在泉為珠，著壁成繪。」 「 繪 」也表示作畫。北齊顏之推《顏氏家訓‧雜藝》：「畫繪之工，亦為妙矣；自古名士，多或能之。」 「 繪 」還表示描寫。清梁廷枬《曲话》三：「《桃花扇》笔意疏爽，写南朝人物，字字绘影绘声。」
From " 糸", " 会" sound, the original meaning is colorful embroidery. "Shu Wen": "Will five pick embroidery. "Yu Shu" said: Shanlong Hua Chong painted. "The Analects of Confucius" said: painting after the matter. From Shito, Huisheng." Southern Liang Liu Xie "Wen Xin Diao Long‧ Zong "Skill": "If you look at it, you will be painted, and if you listen, you will be silk spring." " Draw" can mean a picture. Tang Yinfan's "Heyue Heroes Collection‧ Wang Wei": "The poems are elegant and elegant, and the meaning is new and comfortable. They are pearls in the spring and painted on the wall." " Painting" also means painting. "The Family Instructions of the Yan Family: Variety Art" of the Northern Qi Yanzhi: "The work of painting and drawing is also wonderful; since ancient times, celebrities are more or less capable." " E" also means description. Qing Liang Tingzhan's "Qu Hua" 3: ""Peach Blossom Fan" has a succinct brushwork, depicting characters from the Southern Dynasties, and the words are painted with shadows and sounds.

繪字的基本解释

繪
huì
见“绘”。

繪字的汉语字典释义

[①]［huì］
［《廣韻》黄外切，去泰，匣。］
“绘1”的繁体字。
(1)彩绣。
(2)指图画。
(3)作画。
(4)描摹。参见“繪影繪聲”。

繪字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【糸字部】　繪； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页940第06
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?胡對切，音潰。【說文】會五采繡也。【小爾雅】雜彩曰繪。【玉篇】綵畫也。【論語】繪事後素。【何晏註】繪，畫文也。【釋文】本又作繢。　又【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】?黃外切，音會。義同。　又與會同。【書·益稷】日月星辰山龍華蟲作會。【傳】會，五采也。以五采成此畫焉。【釋文】會，馬鄭作繪。　又與鄶同。【穀梁傳·宣十八年】邾人戕繪子于繒。【釋文】繪，本或作鄶。　又【集韻】古外切，音儈。五采束髮也。

繪字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

繪字的起名意思

暂无。
